summary.title: Multi-Funnel Expansion & Enhanced Analytics
summary.description: Expand assessment portfolio with sleep and recovery funnels, enhance content management, add advanced analytics, and implement comprehensive testing infrastructure.

epics_planned.name: Multi-Funnel Architecture
epics_planned.description: Support multiple concurrent assessment funnels with navigation between them

epics_planned.name: Sleep Assessment Funnel
epics_planned.description: Complete sleep quality and patterns assessment funnel

epics_planned.name: Content Management V2
epics_planned.description: Visual editor, versioning, media management, and templates

epics_planned.name: Analytics & Reporting V2
epics_planned.description: Longitudinal analysis, comparison reports, data export, enhanced dashboard

epics_planned.name: Testing Infrastructure
epics_planned.description: Automated testing suite with unit, integration, and E2E tests

epics_planned.name: Performance & Monitoring
epics_planned.description: Production monitoring, error tracking, and performance optimization

prerequisites: Initial user feedback from v0.4 collected
Medical team input on new assessment content

risks.mitigation: Start content creation early, use placeholders for development
Strict epic boundaries, regular scope reviews
Careful migration planning, feature flags, staged rollout

must_have: At least 2 additional funnels (sleep, recovery) fully functional
Performance metrics meet or exceed v0.4

open_questions: Which analytics service to use? (PostHog, Mixpanel, custom)
Testing framework preference? (Jest vs Vitest, Playwright vs Cypress)
Content editor choice? (TipTap, Slate, Draft.js, Lexical)

internal: UI/UX team for new feature designs

notes: This is a draft planning document. All epics, timelines, and priorities are subject to change based on stakeholder feedback and business priorities.
